statements: DELETE FROM components WHERE quantity < 10 AND price > 100.00
DELETE FROM components WHERE component_name LIKE 'R%'
DELETE FROM component_suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM component_suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp');
DELETE FROM robot_components WHERE component_id IN (SELECT component_id FROM component_suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'XYZ Inc');
DELETE FROM robot_components WHERE quantity < 10 AND warehouse_id IN (SELECT warehouse_id FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York');
DELETE FROM ComponentInventory WHERE component_id IN (SELECT component_id FROM RobotComponents WHERE price > 1000);
DELETE FROM ComponentOrders WHERE delivery_status = 'Pending' AND order_date < '2023-01-01';
